
## Load Data
```{r}
titanic <- read_csv("titanic.csv")
```
## Clean the data
```{r}
titanic$Survived <- as.factor(titanic$Survived)
titanic$Sex <- as.factor(titanic$Sex)
titanic$Pclass <- as.factor(titanic$Pclass)
titanic$Embarked <- as.factor(titanic$Embarked)
titanic
```
